market: AI is shifting from capacity race to economics race: winners are increasingly those with distribution, workflow ownership, and measurable pilot-to-production conversion.
tech: Monetization is strongest in inference efficiency, workflow-native copilots, and governed enterprise deployment; benchmark-only progress and generic agents remain overhyped.
risk: Key downside is capex/payback mismatch amplified by export controls, power constraints, and regulatory liability uncertainty if revenue quality lags spend.
